jenes.chromosome.codings.BooleanCoding

jenes.chromosome.codings.BooleanCoding Class Reference

Inherits jenes::chromosome::BitwiseChromosome::BitCoding< Boolean >.

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 BooleanCoding ()
Boolean decode (int bits)
int encode (Boolean obj)

Detailed Description

Represents a boolean coding with 1 bit representation. The value false is associated to 0, and true to 1.

Version:
1.2
Since:
1.2

Member Function Documentation

Boolean jenes.chromosome.codings.BooleanCoding.decode ( int  bits  ) 

Returns the value of coded bits. If the argument is 1 it returns true, if 0 then false.

Parameters:
bits coding the object
Returns:
the value

int jenes.chromosome.codings.BooleanCoding.encode ( Boolean  obj  ) 

Returns the bits coding the value. It returns 0 if the argument is false, 1 if true.

Parameters:
obj the boolean value to be coded
Returns:
the coding bits
